About Secret Sauce

Secret Sauce delivers high-energy party rock covers for any occasion… you’ll know every word to every song. (The more you drink, the better we sound!)

Doug Moore

Lead Guitar

David Bittner

Drums

Julie Senger

Lead Vocals

Jason Light

Bass Guitar

Andy Miller

Lead Vocals

Mike Zevitas

Rhythm Guitar, Keyboards
